title: Ticket #6123: add collector stats to show query and fork time
description:
In order to scale the collector even further, we need to know where it is spending its time during queries, how much time we spend forking, and how much time we spend handling an existing query inline because we ran out of fork workers.

We will do this by adding 6 new Miron probes, and 2 additional new attributes:

  • HandleQuery Miron probe for time spent handling query commands where Fork was not attempted.
  • HandleLocate Miron probe for time spent handling locate query commands where Fork was not attempted.
  • HandleQueryForked Miron probe for time spent forking to handle query commands
  • HandleLocateForked Miron probe for time spent forking to handle locate query commands
  • HandleQueryMissedFork Miron probe for time spent handling queries the the main Collector because we could not fork
  • HandleLocateMissedFork Miron probe for time spent handling locate queries in the main Collector because we could not fork
  • PeakForkWorkers The largest number of active fork workers in the lifetime of the collector
  • CurrentForkWorkers The number of active fork workers.
